thread.title: Insomniac Records/Interscope Artist Arty Announces Tour and 'Glorious' Album Pre-Order
thread.title_full: Insomniac Records/Interscope Artist Arty Announces Tour and 'Glorious' Album Pre-Order - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Insomniac Records/Interscope Artist Arty Announces Tour and 'Glorious' Album Pre-Order
text:
Insomniac Records/Interscope
'Glorious' now available for pre-order with two instant-grat singles
Glorious Tour Phase 2 also announced
SANTA MONICA, Calif. , Oct. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- LA-based Russian EDM star Arty's debut album 'Glorious', being released via Insomniac Records/Interscope, is fast approaching, and is available for pre order now. Eager fans that pre order from October 2 will receive two instat grat tracks.
The two tracks in question are the anthemic ' Glorious' and ' Waste Your Time '. All pre-orders from October 2 will receive both tracks instantly, with the full album released on October 9 . Pre order 'Glorious' here: http://smarturl.it/ArtyGlorious
The title-track ' Glorious ' was premiered by Complex last week, and features the lush vocals of indie-pop outfit Blondfire , all wrapped-up with acoustic guitar strums, a cute trancey lead line and sumptuous production to create a seriously classy slice of electronic pop. " Once the drop hits, the listener is transported to another dimension of feels," said Complex . "Don't be surprised if the shuffler inside of you gets to stepping on the dance floor."
Arty will also embark on his global Glorious Phase 2 Tour to mark the album release. Expect mind-blowing production and some very special guests. Kicking off with his album release event at Webster Hall (NYC), Arty is everywhere around the world to play his big hits. The Glorious tour is a show dedicated to Arty's debut album which can't be missed. Please see below for all dates.
